body.p: This section allows you to add tasks and assign them to your focus sessions throughout the day.

ol.li: Click the Add Add button button in the "Tasks" Section.
Enter the task title and hit the enter button.
You can save upto a couple of tasks and select/deselect them for your session.

Click the See more See more icon in order to :
Expand task list.
Collapse task list.
Choose a task list.
From the existing task lists.
